venue.address_1: Between Church, Elm, Temple and Chapel streets
venue.name: Lower New Haven Green

item.description:
The Squirrel Nut Zippers (you know that 90's one-hit wonder band) is performing a free concert on the New Haven green as part of our city's free music series. These are always a great time and this one should be no different.

Bring a chair/blanket, bring some beer/wine, bring your ability to enjoy free music while sitting outdoors with friends.

I'll be at the green around 5:30pm to stake out a place for my blanket and start enjoying my crackers with cheese and wine. I can't say for sure where I'll be sitting yet, but if you can't find me give me a call.

Contact: Jeanie (203) 494-3518
item.name: Free Concert on the Green (with Squirrels)
